Articles.Content:
Start by writing in your name and when you started playing in a graph like this so know how you are

Name: example ( boob)

Stated playing: example ( 5/13/4)

This challenge is for the type that haven't just made it to the mun yet I want you to build a moon base not to big and submit it to me all entries are approved this I'd not a comp but a Meir test

Thanks - boob ( ksp expert )
